description:
Average length of stay

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
45412 Monthly tourism survey

Definition:
Overnight stays to arrivals ratio (overnight stays/
arrivals). Arithmetically, the average length of stay can be
longer, for instance, in places with prevention and
rehabilitation centres than the number of calendar days in
the reference period as some guests or patients may stay
longer than one calendar month in such accommodation
establishments.
